title: 94/214/EC: Commission Decision of 13 April 1994 amending Decision 93/693/EC concerning a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 April 1994 amending Decision 93/693/EC concerning a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species (Text with EEA relevance)  (94/214/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Part 4 of the Annex to Decision 93/693/EC, the following semen collection centre is deleted:
'Raebyvaegen
24292 Hoerby
Approval code: S.E.1'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 April 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 194, 22. 7. 1988, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 186, 28. 7. 1993, p. 28.
(3) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 35.
